This is the best game on the market and it will probably stay that way forever. It is a masterpiece in every way and a video game classic that you have to play at least once. I love this game, the humor is amazing, the puzzles are rewarding and the way that the physics of the game work makes this super satisfying to play and figure out. The game is full of achievements and Easter eggs that make replaying Portal 2 a couple of months after your first play through super fun.  Absolutely amazing game
